showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ parking does cost here. It is five dollars a night. They also have a shower available. I was told it was five dollars but when I went in to take my shower, the lady charged me seven dollars for the shower. Couple of dollars who really ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ We ended up staying the night so we could shower in the morning, but nope we couldn‚Äôt do that either. I requested a refund because the bathroom was absolutely disgusting. Just look at the pictures! ‚Ä¶

Best oldschool truck stop I wasn't able to take a shower yesterday was to tired fell asleep in front seat lol but anyway dropped my load and was waiting for my next load assignment before my stomach started you know what I mean and this ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ only truck stop so we had no choice but to stay here. Parking is $15 per day ( 1 star lost because truck parking should be free) Showers were $15 and $19 for the larger one. The gas station itself was very clean and organized, as was the ‚Ä¶

Shower for 2 people in the same bathroom is 22$. Went into the shower and it was gross... human hair clogging the drain and roaches coming from the mirror... would NOT reccomend this place. It's unfortunate because there's only 2 truck ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ at 6pm while daytime is free. They also do light mechanic work along with a truck wash. Please don't forget to take a shower. A few minutes walking distance you'll find a lot of places to eat. Starbucks, Steak house, Wendys, Sports bar ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ they revamped the place...it also could use a cleaning.  It's paid parking and the lot is in good shape. I would definitely take a shower here now as they are brand new and not those sewer swamps they called showers that we're here before.
‚Ä¶ Kema was super cool to my wife and I and was really helpful with our shower set up. ‚Ä¶
Stopped to take a shower. It was filthy. Hair everywhere. Towels were so dirty I refused to use them. No venting in the room so it was so hot you could hardly get dressed.
‚Ä¶ ~SHOWERS: ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Want to park? There‚Äôs a fee. Need a shower? Another fee. It felt like they were trying to squeeze every cent out of truckers.To make matters worse, the parking area was poorly maintained and not truck-friendly at all. Definitely ‚Ä¶
Seem like nice people but shower dirty, no power to outlets to shave or use blow dryer, $15 to park, $15 to shower, towels are gross!

‚Ä¶ truckstop in the East Coast, it‚Äôs all about money and they even charge for ice if you bring your cup. Bathrooms are dirty and they ask for you to leave your driver license to take a shower. However they do have plenty of parking, for a fee.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ lately though. Today the shower I waited in line half an hour for was the same one that kept being assigned to guys waiting over and over and it was locked from the inside as the staff completely ignored the showers. Wrong order at ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , friendly, and show a level of patience that is rare to find in other truck stops, especially when dealing with truck drivers. I also had a quick shower, and I was impressed ‚Äî the restrooms were clean, sanitized, and smelled fresh. ‚Ä¶
Nice clean hot shower and it has a clean fan, nice staff. Not much truck parking so it gets filled quickly. And they have a Bojangles!!! Great location

I was riding with a friend in his 18 wheeler truck and we stopped here so we can take a shower. I was really impressed how clean the showers bathroom  were. It was my 2st time taking a shower at a truck stop üòÅ They even had fresh clean ‚Ä¶

Not that reviews do anything but anyways....If you're looking to wind down after a long day with a hot shower,  DEFINITELY DON'T EXPECT THAT HERE!!!  You'd be better off showering in a 3rd world country or wiping yourself down with baby ‚Ä¶

I literally love Love's. That being said, this was a very dissatisfied experience. My shower was filthy. I hope this was a bad night because it was disgusting. First time I have ever been dissapointed in a Love's.

showerReviews.reviewText: AMY overnight manger üòä üí´ üåü üí´ is amazing! She was kind, friendly and helpful about getting my husband and I a shower this morning. We travel across the country truck driving and this IS the cleanest and best Loves. Im speaking for overnight, ‚Ä¶

Again! These showers are never hardly clean at loves. I do not know what's happening?? But I said something to the cashier and she had the nerve to get an attitude and argue with me. Ma'am you work here it's your job to clean the showers!! ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ you're blocked in easily here. Its got a full-blown Dunkin donuts which is a plus. Only two showers, shower line long don't even bother. Overall, I wouldn't stop here again unless I was absolutely desperate for parking besides that move on.

‚Ä¶ I observed that they sold 1lb of bacon for $10, which i thought was interesting. They had a shower area for truck drivers. There is propane Tanks, ATM, and ice. ‚Ä¶
The overnight ladies were awsome, there were no showers clean when I went in,the young lady got me hooked up,and I got a shower...thx....fyi...parking is terrible..

This is a Shell's gas station that calls itself a Pilot Travel Center the showers you need a shower key Pilot Travel Center corporate office need to come down here every item in this store is averaging $3 above any pilot around the country ‚Ä¶

Came in to get a shower and sat for 45min because the cleaning person was no where to be found. There's no hot food here the coolers are just barely filled. The diesel pumps barley work, some of the employees are rude. This is by far the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ real pilot they just franchise with them this is like a overpriced 7-Eleven there is no hot food if you can avoid this place do it at all cost they only got 10 real parking spots they don't even have real showers you got to get a shower key
Barely warm water in the shower. If you in line for a shower that does NOT mean you get it. Small parking, no Subway, no food...
Limited parking, limited hot food, 2 large showers. My shower was cold. The staff was nice, and the store and showers were kept clean.
